comment: Voice your concerns in a more sympathetic manner without the hateful comments.
amr:
# ::snt Voice your concerns in a more sympathetic manner without the hateful comments.
(v / voice-01
      :mode imperative
      :ARG0 (y / you)
      :ARG1 (c / concern-01
            :ARG1 y)
      :manner (s / sympathize-01
            :ARG0 y
            :ARG2-of (h / have-degree-91
                  :ARG3 (m / more))
            :ARG1-of h)
      :manner (c2 / comment-01
            :polarity -
            :ARG0 y
            :ARG0-of (h2 / hate-01)))

comment: Ban users who use the n-word in an insulting manner
amr:
# ::snt Ban users who use the n-word in an insulting manner
(b / ban-01
      :mode imperative
      :ARG0 (y / you)
      :ARG2 (p / person
            :ARG0-of (u / use-01
                  :ARG1 (w / word
                        :mod (n / n-word)))
            :ARG0-of u
            :manner (ii / insult-01)))
